pr_title: Avoid the false "cannot find stub file" warnings.

timeline.message: Also check ancestor checkers to avoid a false warning.

timeline.bodyText: Instead of making this field public, please add a getter method next to the existing setter.
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText:
I think you should try to pull this check out before the first use of checker.getClass() on line 192 and simply perform the same logic for either the first checker or one of the parent checkers.
This would include checking for the topLevelResource for each possible checker.
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText: @xingweitian Can you add the missing @param to make the tests pass. You didn't touch that method, but it is "close" to what you added.
timeline.author: wmdietl
